title: The Missing Sweets in the Old Shop

infobox.Title:: The Missing Sweets in the Old Shop
infobox.Japanese title:: 消えた老舗の和菓子  (Kieta Shinise no Wagashi)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Detective Boys  Ran Mouri  Sonoko Suzuki  Kogoro Mouri  Fumimaro Ayanokoji  Detective Kurumazaki  Maro
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi (voice actor) as Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Ryotaro Okiayu as Fumimaro Ayanokoji  Ikuya Sawaki as Detective Kurumazaki  Mitsuaki Hoshino as Kozo Umehara  Sachi Matsumoto as Mako Kawasumi  Masashi Hirose as Craftsman #1, Craftsman #4  Hiromichi Kogami as Craftsman #2  Nobuyuki Kobushi as Craftsman #3  Yuri Amano as Salesclerk #1  Masumi Kageyama as Salesclerk #2, Salesclerk #3

sections.Characters introduced:
- 28 years old
- Inspector from Kyoto Police District
- Ayanokoji's best friend
- Siberian chipmunk
- Detective from Kyoto Prefectural Police Investigation First Division
sections.Situation:
Conan, Ran, Sonoko, Kogoro, and Detective Boys go to Kyoto by train. Ran and Sonoko decide to take the opportunity to buy some local pastries, but the chocolate desserts disappeared from all five stores of a famous confectionery company. The president asks for help from Kogoro to solve this huge case of theft. Inspector Ayanokoji with his chipmunk also join in, but being off duty he must call his assistant, Detective Kurumazaki.

The main suspect is a young woman dressed in pink, with a little pink car suspected. With great effort, Conan finds out the truth and uses the voice of Kogoro, but no need to put him to sleep this time, having been stunned by Ran after punches in face as punishment for going to see cherry blossoms and drinking sake during the case.

sections.Trivia:
- The car Detective Kurumazaki drives is a 2003 dark blue Nissan Bluebird Sylphy [G10].
- Mako Kawasumi drives a 2007 rose metallic Daihatsu Mira Hatchback.
- The motorcycle in the picture shown by Conan is a Honda CB 400 Super Four.
